name: Super Skiddy 3: Things on Ice
overview: A Skiddy kart style racing game with no single player mode, in it you race against a friend as . It has a mini game on title screen similar to Pong from Super Skidmarks. Super Skiddy 3 - Things on Ice is from Simon Hitchen of Gadge Software. It's a 2 player racing game (on ice). There are 4 tracks and there are 3 levels to how icy it is.
